comprehensive_overview: SCAFACOS (Single-Cell Analysis Framework for Assessing Clonal Outcomes of Signaling) is a computational tool designed for analyzing single-cell signaling data and inferring clonal outcomes in cellular systems. It is specifically tailored for studying cellular heterogeneity and clonal dynamics in response to signaling pathways.
core_features: Key features of SCAFACOS include analyzing and visualizing single-cell signaling data, identifying clonal subpopulations within a cell population, assessing clonal diversity and evolution over time, and elucidating the impact of signaling pathways on clonal outcomes.
